alert.note: Alert for Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Perry, west central Meade and north central Breckinridge Counties through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 324 PM EDT/224 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Tell City, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Perry, west central Meade and north central Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Mystic, Frymire, Derby, Sample, Rhodelia, Gerald, Andyville, Ammons, Chenaultt and Rome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for central Kentucky.
